original_text: But they all die one day and their bodies lie under the ground. Worms cover their bodies, whoever they are. But they all die one day and their bodies lie under the ground. Worms cover their bodies, whoever they are. But they all die one day and their bodies lie under the ground. Worms cover their bodies, whoever they are. But they all die one day
korean_text: 이 둘이 매 한 가지로 흙 속에 눕고 그들 위에 구더기가 덮이는구나

sentences.original_text: But they all die one day
and their bodies lie under the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 몸은 땅 아래에 눕는다
